views.markdown: See larger Screenshots below..See larger Screenshots below..See larger Screenshots below..

-Fix safe mode crash -Fix for crash on 32-bit devices -Compatible with FB 88.1 -You can now save FB Stories -Fix recents feed on Facebook v 55.0 version: 1.5r-95
changes:
- Fixed crash on Facebook 53.0
-Fixed most recents on Facebook 49.0 -Compatible with "me" tab version of Facebook
-Due to Parse.com being discontinued by Facebook I have had to re-write my backend services as such this is a major update. If you have purchased ad-removal before please make sure to login again from “++ Settings -> Ad Removal Settings”
-Recents feed now works with latest Facebook 47.0
-Downloads have been completely redone and now there is a download manager :)
-Ad removal settings are much more organized
-Next update will include a much nicer downloading interface ;)
-Compiled for 32/64 bit on iOS 9
-Works on latest Facebook (v41.0)
-Fixed like confirm
-Fixed recents feed
-Fixed ability to disable copy text
-Fixed downloading on v35.0
-No more cross-promotion of other ++ tweaks when you have purchased pro.
-Hold to copy/share post text is now fixed
-Able to download more videos. Please email us if you find videos you cannot download. Compatible with Facebook v 33.0 Fixed crash on Facebook v29.0 -Automatic downgrade removed as per repo rules
-You can now downgrade by adding http://beta.unlimapps.com and installing FBDowngradeEnabler

-Fixed in-app messenger
-Added option for most recents feed in main feed
-Added additional sharing options for links

-Fixed crash when full screen was enabled and lib status bar was installed
